title: Ziggs Icon?
body: How did I get this icon? Anyone?

replies.body: You didn't leave a game of nemesis draft
Yup! You've played at least one game of Nemesis Draft, and didn't dodge!
Are there any other rewards other than the icon?
out of curiosity, i've seen someone else ask this, since i accidentally dodged 1 game, am i still eligible for the icon?
Unfortunately, you won't be receiving the icon. D:
I had a problem with my client and it crashed while in a champ select for nemesis draft, will I be ineligible for the icon?
Yup, it's the Nemesis Draft icon that they started distributing now that the mode is gone.
You got it for participating in Nemesis. It said you wouldn't get the icon until a while after the mode left.
